name: Boule Maniac VR
description:
Summary:

You are a lost soul in a dwarfen world. The gamemaster invites you to play a game of Boule Ball using VR Interactions. 6 Balls. 1 Target. The player closest to the target wins the round. Who knows what happens to the other players.

Each round you get the chance to destroy the game with two of the chaotic special balls. Choose wisely.

- Slime Ball
- Tower Ball
- Big Ball
- Explosion Ball
- Gravity Ball

Someone regretting their choice of the tower? Features:

- VR Player
- Simulated VR Player (for PC Users!)
- Coop up to 4 Players

How to play?

The game supports VR and a simple non-VR Player mode.

Select accordingly in the Main Menu.

For VR Users the experience can be different.
Some glasses require you to start SteamVR before joining a lobby.

The VR only connects once you find an active Lobby or Host a game yourself. Before that you have to use the ingame Menu.

The project was the result of a 2 week game jam challenging ourself to make a VR Game in a short timeframe. We had some fun with the experience and wanted to share!

Who are we?

A pair of experienced Computer Scientists turned rogue.
Proudcake and Arikae. Whatever Games.

We play games and break games creating a lot of fun memories, and would like to use our coding abilities to bring these kind of memories to our players.

We worked on multiple small projects in our spare time so far. This is our first released demo. Our ambition is creating fun gameplay experiences.

Keep watch for our next project: A co-op hack and slash dungeon builder game!

We'd like to hear your feedback. Maybe hop into a game together. :)
